title: Mahomes the Magician, DK needs the cart
description:
Chiefs get the big win behind Patrick Mahomes big play on Sunday night over Tom Brady and the Bucs. Listen as the guys breakdown his unique play, is it time for Eric Bieniemy to finally get that head coaching job? Also, Bills mafia stand up as Buffalo comeback over the Ravens. Find out if the guys think the Dolphins game was a fluke and if this was a get right game for the Super Bowl favorites. Also, DK Metcalf needed the cart for a bathroom break? Jalen tells you the real secret about Ford Field in Detroit and how that cart might have been a necessity. Plus, QB controversy in Dallas? Jerry Jones gets his wish as Cooper Rush gets another win for the Cowboys, but will it last? All that and more.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
